NonXMLResume.TextResume:
D.CHAMUNDESWARI
chamundeswari.dasari@gmail.com
91-9247500069

OBJECTIVE:
Aspiring for career advancement in a progressive organization that completely challenges and utilizes my skills and abilities to the best, and to be an asset to the organization that provides opportunities to lead and to be innovative, and promotes an environment aiming at mutual growth.
PROFILE:
Over 11.8 years of extensive experience, in core software application development on Java platform, developing enterprise applications. Dedicated, enthusiastic, competent, self-motivated, result oriented team professional with a flair for new technologies, and concepts, and possessing good inter-personnel and communication skills. Thrive in deadline-driven environments

WORK EXPERIENCE:   11+ years
* Senior software Engineer in CA Technologies     now Broadcom  	  June 2015 to till date
* Senior Consultant in Capgemini Private Ltd	  May 2014-May 2015
* Sr. System Analyst in Wave Crest Payment Technology Pvt Ltd	  July 2011-Sept 2013
* Member Technical in ADP India Pvt Ltd	  April-2010- July 2011
* Module Lead in Satyam Computers Services Ltd	  Sept 2007 - Mar 2010

SKILLS:
Programming Languages: JAVA-J2EE
Frameworks: Hibernate, struts, EJB, Spring, JSF, REST, SOAP Web Services, AJAX, Groovy on	Grails, PHP
Markup Languages: HTML, CSS, XML, JSON
Tools: Ant, Maven, Hudson
Databases: Oracle, MySQL, SQL Server
Scripting: JavaScript, jQuery, Angular JS, Ext-JS
Application Servers: Oracle WebLogic, Apache Tomcat
Operating Systems: Linux, Windows
Domains: Banking, Financial, Security, Networking
Repositories: SVN, CVS, Mercurial, Git
Process: Scrum Model/ AGILE Methodology, scrum master

EDUCATION:
* Master of Computer Applications (MCA) from Nagarjuna University	  2003 - 06
* Bachelor of computers (BCA) from Nagarjuna University	  2000 - 03

APPRECIATIONS:
* Received Efficient Associate Award for 2009 @ Mahindra Satyam
* Received POB in 2009 @ Mahindra Satyam


TRAININGS/CONFERENCES
* Provided the Core Java training to Fresher's in  Mahindra Satyam through SLC
* Knowledge sharing to the team members on various topics like: Spring MVC and web services.
* Attended GHCI -2018

PRODUCTS / PROJECTS:

* Privileged-Access-Manager (PAM)	  July 2018- till date
About Layer7 Privileged Access Management (formerly CA Privileged Access Management) is designed to prevent security breaches by providing granular authorization of users to systems and accounts, constantly monitoring privileged activity to assess for risk, triggering automated mitigations when higher risk is detected, auditing and recording attempts to access as well as vaulting and rotating the privileged account's credentials including passwords or key/token-based authentication.
Company: CA Technologies
Team Size: 50
Platform: Java, spring, Ext-JS, MySQL, Tomcat, Jboss, REST services
Roles & Responsibilities:
• Working with the Product management in gathering the requirements
• Working with the Architecture team in defining the architecture
• Working in Scrum model in developing the product which aligns to the defined architecture and in building right product with high quality
• Effectively delivering the customer issues on time with quality
• Code reviews, Product training to new joiners
• Part of interview panel
* Secure cloud	  June-2015--June/2018
About: CA Secure Cloud solution is a suite of cloud-based security services that enable organizations to manage user identities and authentication effectively. It's has the capabilities of User Management, Access Management, Password Policies, Identity Management, Advanced Authentication, Single Sign-On, Auditing & Reporting and monitoring.
Company: CA Technologies
Team Size: 20
Platform: Java, Spring Framework, Oracle, Postgresql, Wildfly, Jasper server, API Gateway
Roles & Responsibilities:
• Scrum master for 6-months and delivered the release on time.
• Responsible for Jasper reports implementation
• Effectively delivered customer issues on time with quality
• Performing Code Reviews, part of interview panel
• Mentoring the team members as required.


* RMS Portal (Remote Management Services Portal)	  May 2014 - May 2015
About: RMS offers are designed to enable high performance, availability and use. Whether your customers are looking for baseline monitoring and notification or seeking full-scale operational management, RMS can flexibly respond to the needs of your customers' environment. It delivers common service levels across all technologies for a simplified experience.
Company: Capgemini -Client - CISCO
Team Size: 10
Platform: Java, spring framework, Groovy on grails, SVN, jquery
Role: Worked as a Module lead for end- to- end development.


* My Monedero	  July 2011- Sept- 2013
About: My Mondero is an alternative to a bank account with online access to all your personal details and transactions. Provides customers a safe and secure product to make and receive payments, Protects the customer financial details in e-Wallet and provides access to funds for shopping, transfers and cash withdraws & makes receiving payments with very low cost.
Company: wavecrest
Team Size: 10
Platform: Java, Struts framework, Oracle
Role: Worked as a Lead -
• Tracking of Project Iteration and team members work Progress.
•  Responsible for writing common utility classes which are used throughout application
• Mentoring  the team  ; Involved in taking Interviews


* VANTAGE (HRII- HR Innovation Initiative)	  April 2010-July 2011
About: Vantage HCM is ADP's new solution targeted at the complex domestic customer market. The product is an integrated suite of HR, benefits, payroll, talent, and time and labor functionality .It is providing non-downloadable computer software in the fields of recruiting, on-boarding, employee records and HR management, employee benefits management, time, attendance.
Company: ADP
Team Size: 10
Platform: J2ee, Hiberanate, JSF, Webshpere server and tools Junit, CVS, oracle, dojo
• Role: Worked as a Developer -
• Used Log4j Framework for logging and debugging the application.
• Performed active role in Software Design, Development and Testing of the application.
• Developed UI Screens using JSF, DOJO Tag libraries.


* NextGen -Next Generation Banking system	  Sept 2007-Mar 2010
About: The Citco Group of Companies, a global organization of financial services companies, has provided hedge funds, private equity and real estate firms, institutional banks, Global 1000 companies, and high net worth individuals, with niche financial services in hedge fund administration, custody and fund trading, financial products& corporate and fiduciary solutions.
Company: Satyam Computers
Team Size: 10
Platform: Java, Struts framework, Oracle, Hibernate, EJB,
Role: Worked as a Lead & Developer
• Involved in Designing the flow of module using RSA, Implementation of Action classes
• Used various Design Patterns like Business Delegate, singleton, DAO..etc.
• Worked from JSP to DAO Implementation  for Receive Certificates, Written Junit Test cases

(CHAMUNDESWARI DASARI

sov:ExperienceSummary.sov:Description: D. CHAMUNDESWARI's experience appears to be strongly concentrated in Information Technology (mostly Java) and slightly concentrated in Finance (mostly Trading). D. CHAMUNDESWARI has 12 years of work experience, with several years tenure in management, including a low-level position.
sov:ExperienceSummary.sov:ManagementStory:
Starting on 9/1/2007, the candidate held the following low-level management position for 2 years and 7 months:
	Title: Module Lead for Satyam Computers Services Ltd

sov:Information: [Sovren:303;5] The following section in the resume contains more content than the work history and education sections combined: 'TRAININGS/CONFERENCES'. This may indicate a problem with section headers, formatting, or content.
[Sovren:213;] A street level address was not found in the contact information. A full contact address should always be included in a resume as it allows for location based searches.

[Sovren:112;] The following section was identified as a skills section type: 'SKILLS'. Skills should not be in a separate section, but instead, each skill should be included in the descriptions of work history or education.

[Sovren:151;0,2] The following sections do not have the header on a separate line: 'OBJECTIVE:', 'WORK EXPERIENCE'. Every section should have a clear, unambiguous, commonly-used header on a separate line directly above the content associated with it.
